code: function isIdentityScale(scale){return scale===undefined||scale===1;}function hasScale(_ref){let{scale,scaleX,scaleY}=_ref;return!isIdentityScale(scale)||!isIdentityScale(scaleX)||!isIdentityScale(scaleY);}function hasTransform(values){return hasScale(values)||has2DTranslate(values)||values.z||values.rotate||values.rotateX||values.rotateY||values.skewX||values.skewY;}function has2DTranslate(values){return is2DTranslate(values.x)||is2DTranslate(values.y);}function is2DTranslate(value){return value&&value!=="0%";}export{has2DTranslate,hasScale,hasTransform};
